resources.string: The signing-in process isn\'t completed yet. If you see the confirmation page from Twitter then please wait a few more seconds and it will finish automatically.\n\nWould you like to cancel signing in?
Could not contact Twitter. Please try again.

This isn\'t even an alpha build. This is basically just the app skeleton at this point. The service to send the tweets is not currently written. You can save a tweet and send it by long pressing it and selecting the \"send now\" option, but other than that, this is just the skeleton.\n\nI need people to test it out, make sure that I didn\'t overlook anything stupid, that there are no repeated FCs, etc, etc.
